title: Flame the jungler
body:
One thing i learnt as a jungler its perfectly OK to flame jungler/support. But when jungler shits back on you its whole team reports you because you chose champ that doesn;t help facilitate ganks so get jungler ban. 

literally get flamed whether i do well or bad because one of the laners do bad and expect me to tent their lane when i got other lanes ahead. yet still its still somehow your fault.

This is a meme for a reason

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3siuaM7ZPC

Riot logic= garbage + double standards

replies.body:
If you type /mute all in chat at minute 0:00 in game, you will not read their flame nor pings
In addition, it is peaceful
